attributes.action: The people of Britain stand in solidarity with the struggle of the people  of Greece against the rise of an openly fascist  party, Golden Dawn.
attributes.additional_details: The people of Britain stand in solidarity with the struggle of the people of Greece against the rise of an openly fascist party, Golden Dawn in there country. We are disgusted that this party openly uses orginised violence against both vulnerable groups and political opponents. We call on our British Government to support parties and organisations in Greece who are organising against the threat to our democracy in Europe by Golden Down...
